flashcards.title: Meaning of R in DRABC
flashcards.knowledge_summary: In the DRABC primary survey, the letter R stands for Response, indicating you must check whether the casualty reacts to voice or touch.

flashcards.answer: Whether the casualty responds to verbal or physical stimulation.
